comments:
Convert file in Word2Vec format and writes two files 2D tensor TSV file.

File "tensor_filename"_tensor.tsv contains word-vectors, "tensor_filename"_metadata.tsv contains words.

Parameters ---------- word2vec_model_path : str Path to file in Word2Vec format. tensor_filename : str Prefix for output files. binary : bool, optional True if input file in binary format.
